Getting past D class
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Monster Farm 4 (Spoilers!): Reviews, Information on Gameplay, Etc. : Getting past D class
By Shankdaddy on Monday, August 25, 2003 - 09:57 am:

For the life of me, I can't figure out how to get past D class. I can't even enter the D class tournament. I can enter any tournament but the official one. What do you have to do before you can enter the official tournament?

By Raistlin_Majere on Monday, August 25, 2003 - 05:13 pm:

you have to finish a storyline first to be able to raise your breeder rank. Go to town and talk to people or go to an adventure and try to finish it.

By Shankdaddy on Monday, August 25, 2003 - 08:02 pm:

Ok, thanks. When you say adventure, you mean exploring the cave? How do you finish it? just make it to the top? I'm sorry if I sound dumb but I'm trying all kinds of things and I can't figure it out.

By Raistlin_Majere on Monday, August 25, 2003 - 09:04 pm:

yes reach the top or exit. try going into towns and talking to the people there. they would give you clues as to what you should do next

By Shankdaddy on Tuesday, August 26, 2003 - 01:11 am:

Ok here's what I've done. I've fought in every D class tournament possible, I've been to the top of the cave, and fought/lost to the god monster up there, and I went to town and talked to everyone I could. And they have nothing new to say to me.

For some stupid reason, I still can't enter the official D tournament. AAAAARGH!

By Raistlin_Majere on Tuesday, August 26, 2003 - 01:27 am:

you have to win against the boss monster not lose :) its advisable to bring 3 monsters in adventures :)

By Shankdaddy on Tuesday, August 26, 2003 - 01:35 am:

oh wow. Hmm.. ok, I'm gonna try again. Thanks. That guy really whooped me though!

By Kageromeru on Tuesday, November 25, 2003 - 12:20 pm:
